website_summaries.verdict: An excellent lens for portrait, product, street and similar standard-lens photography uses where you want to inject a little creative twist, the Lensbaby Velvet 56 adds that bit of something extra.
pros: The Lensbaby Velvet 56 is well constructed with a strongly dampened focusing ring, and it produces lovely, soft out-of-focus areas with round highlights
cons: It's manual focus only, which may put some people off

customer_reviews.title: The Lensbaby 56 is one of my favorite lenses for doing portraits or close ups of flowers
customer_reviews.text: The Lensbaby 56 is one of my favorite lenses for doing portraits or close ups of flowers. At 2.0 there is a soft glow around a center focal point. It makes for gorgeous, ethereal pictures. At 5.6 and above, this is a super sharp lens. I was a little intimated by the manual focus, but it is actually quite easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aperture Ring Extremely Loose
customer_reviews.text: Got my copy in. There’s a little play when using the focusing ring. My biggest complaint is that the aperture ring is very loose. I’ve been using manual focusing since I was a teen and can tell you that even old used manual lenses don’t turn this easy. It feels like an overly used lens. - I believe the lens is overpriced for the play and the loose aperture ring.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Alaniz

customer_reviews.title: Creative, enjoyable, solid build...
customer_reviews.text: This lens is sharp. The images are crisp and wonderful. However, when focusing on f5 or less, the glowing effect tends to overpower the image for my taste... and focusing properly for the image can be difficult in certain circumstances. The lens is also quite hefty in terms of weight, but it is definitely a solid build. Creative and fun, as always is expected from Lensbaby. I enjoy their brand immensely and recommend them to anyone professional and hobbyist alike.
customer_reviews.author: Count_Dude

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful lens. Takes a while to get used to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful lens. Takes a while to get used to but the results are spectacular.
customer_reviews.author: Ivona H.

customer_reviews.title: This piece of glass is phenomenal! It takes a ...
customer_reviews.text: This piece of glass is phenomenal! It takes a little bit of getting used to, but SO WORTH the extra effort. I'm truly awe-inspired when using this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Walters

customer_reviews.title: Good fun lens for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting this lens for some time and finally broke down and got it. Annoyed that i didn't get it when on sale for $50 less, but that's the way it goes. Still figuring it all out, but a lovely lens, heavy and the only complaint would be that for the cost, it really should have a lens bag or similar.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh LofgrenTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the way my pictures turn out with my new lens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lens for soft focus macro
customer_reviews.text: I would like the ability to turn off the softness if I want to use as a normal lens. It’s a great lens for soft focus macro. I’ve enjoyed using the lens so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lionel Hedden

customer_reviews.title: Love Lensbaby
customer_reviews.text: I love Lensbaby lens. I bought this to take engagement photos for my daughter I need to work with the lens more but I love it! The backgrounds are soft and really nice for fall photos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This lens is surprisingly versatile - from the dreamy look ...
customer_reviews.text: This lens is surprisingly versatile - from the dreamy look lensbaby is known for to tack sharp images. No autofocus. I have taken quite a few pics with one version sharp, one version dreamy. Take a look at flickr - search for tag "LENSBABY Velvet 56"
customer_reviews.author: R. Hagan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this lens makes my photos look.
customer_reviews.author: Movie lover

customer_reviews.title: Lensbaby Velvet 56
customer_reviews.text: I don't like Lensbaby products and this is no exception. I bought it because of all the hype and hullabaloo. It's overpriced and just doesn't give the look that I want. I find the bokeh very unattractive and the effects are pretty much lost at smaller f stops. Even though I have gotten a few very good photos with it, I will be selling it. The lens is well made and easy to use. No complaints on the quality. All of this is just my opinion. You may well like it.
customer_reviews.author: BillD

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was beyond my experience. I had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Patroske

customer_reviews.title: Check your Copy for Quality Control Issues....
customer_reviews.text: Apart from the generally awkward implementation that Lensbaby's are notoriously famous for, this lens has tolerance issues regarding mounting the lens to a Canon body mount. My copy wobbles on the mount considerably, and if it were any other lens than a Lensbaby, the result would be opaque and disastrous. Use at your own risk!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

product_meta.title: Lensbaby LB-V56BC Velvet 56" Lens for Canon EF Camera
product_meta.description: Our Velvet 56 classic portrait lens gives you a velvety, ethereal start with a smooth finish, from the big picture to the smallest details. Bringing modern-day simplicity to the carefully crafted build and look of mid-20th century portrait lenses, this 56mm f/1.6 manual portrait and macro lens evokes an experience like no other. Embrace the moment as you easily go from capturing gorgeous, radiant environments to intimate details in the same scene.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars31 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
